author: etan_status
content:
Once the light client protocols are standardized, you can expect every beacon API provider to make them available (default on / opt-out).
The current REST endpoints are being discussed here: https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/181

author: etan_status
content:
A lot of progress towards standardization of consensus light client protocols has been made during Devconnect AMS.
Summaries of technical discussions during the week can be found in the comments at the bottom of https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/2802#issuecomment-1107474871
